title: Sion ult sounds
body: Are you supposed to hear sion's ult from anywhere on the map?  I'm not sure as to how far I away from him I have heard it but it seems like you can hear it from just about anywhere...

can you hear it if you dont have vision of sion?

> can you hear it if you dont have vision of sion?

Yes

My friends and I have been experiencing a bug where you can only hear the 'Dong' sound when Sion is in vision. We extensively tested this and it only sounds when he is in vision, if he ult's and never enters vision of your team no one on your team will hear it, however everyone on the Sion's team hears it as they are in vision of sion. We tried this a number of times and the same results happened.
